data.Name: Forever Came Calling
data.Bio: Forever Came Calling is a pop punk band from Twentynine Palms, California formed in 2006. They have released one EP, a split with Handguns, a split with Family Thief and two full lengths. Their debut album, Contender, was released on July 24th, 2012 and is available via Pure Noise Records. 2013 was a significant for the group, with the group earning a spot on the 2013 Warped Tour. They also played on Real Friends' October/November US Tour. 2014 was also significant for the group Read more on Last.fm
